general.gigTitle: design and develop professional wordpress websites

sellerCard.description:
Hello, My name is Uzair and I have done a Bachelor's in Computer Science. I have great expertise in working on web-based projects. I have worked on quite many big-scale projects on the latest technologies and latest languages. My core interest is in PHP and I love to create user-friendly websites and management systems using latest and in-demand frameworks of PHP such as CodeIgniter and Laravel.
I also have quite much experience on working with AutoCAD. I can create any type of 2-D and 3-D architecture, construction designs.

description.content:
Welcome, Mr. Buyer


My name is Uzair and I am an experienced programmer having 2 years of experience in the designing and development of websites. I will provide you efficient work within the time and your budget.


All wordpress websites will have an extremely attractive and user-friendly design and will be responsive and compatible on all devices. 


My Gig Offerings:


Basic Package: One Page/ Landing Page Website

  • One Page/ Landing Page
  • User Friendly Design
  • CTA: Call-to-action Forms
  • Other demands can be discussed via inbox


Standard Package: 5 pages wordpress website

  • 5 pages website
  • Content Uploading(Images and Textual Content Provided by Client)
  • User-friendly Design
  • Other demands can be discussed via inbox


Premium Package: E-Commerce wordpress shop

  • Complete shopping site (e-commerce)
  • Premium Wordpress Themes
  • Premium Plugins
  • Product Uploading
  • User-friendly Design
  • other demands can be discussed via inbox


Any custom requirements can be discussed via chat.

I would prefer you to contact me before placing the order to discuss about the project.

100% satisfaction guaranteed.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me to get started with my wordpress website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
I will need details about your business, so that the design can be according to the business industry.
2- Your logo(If you don't have, you can order us on our logo designing gig).
3- Textual content
4- Email of Business, Location, Phone, and Social Links(optional)

questionsAndAnswers.question: I do not have the textual content for the wordpress website, can we start?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yeah, I will put dummy content and then later on you will be able to edit the content your self.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I be able to edit my wordpress website by myself?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Of course. I develop websites using wordpress, which offers an intuitive dashboard for the non-tech users. You will be able to edit and maintain the site by yourself once we are done with the development. Even I will be available to guide you if you need any help.

packageList.title: One Page/ Landing Page Website
packageList.description: I will design and develop a one page website, or a landing page

packageList.title: 5 pages wordpress website
packageList.description: I will design and develop complete website including content uploading

packageList.description: I will design and develop online shopping website

reviews.comment: Great delivery as usual. I have written so many awesome feedback about him already and he is just a great developer. Highly recommended!
Top developer like always. Fixes everything
